<span className="text-sm font-semibold text-zinc-900 dark:text-white uppercase tracking-wider flex items-center gap-2 mb-0">
WHAT is this?
</span>

<span className="ml-2 font-bold">Futur</span> is a stunning business template designed to showcase physical products for sale. Built with the latest versions of Next.js and React, it features a modern, elegant, and visually appealing design.
